flawed_nl_solution:
Todd has $25 left after buying ingredients because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=25>>25
Todd made $105 selling snow-cones because 200 x 0.75 = <<200*0.75=105>>105
Todd has $130 before he pays his brother back because 25 + 105 = <<25+105=130>>130
After Todd pays his brother back he has $20 because 130 - 110 = <<130-110=20>>20
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
